title: Social Events
description: ASA's promises are upheld with the various social events hosted each academic year. We also partner with other UC Berkeley Cultural clubs for events.

title: Community Projects
description: Check out ASA's promise for the betterment of Bay Area society and Afghan-Americans.

title: Affinity Spaces
description: We stay up to date on events ongoing in Afghanistan and offer affinity spaces for those impacted here at the UC Berkeley campus.
